#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#define MOD 10000007
using namespace std;
long long fast_exp(long long base,long long exp) {
    long long res=1;
    while(exp>0) {
       if(exp%2==1) res=(res*base)%MOD;
       base=(base*base)%MOD;
       exp/=2;
    }
    return res%MOD;
}


int main(){
int p;
cin>>p;

while(p--){
int t;
cin>>t;

if(t%2==0)
cout<<fast_exp(2,t)+1<<"\n";
else
cout<<fast_exp(2,t)-1<<"\n";
}



}
